Last month a group of our Nuneaton Distribution Centre colleagues supported their local community with a litter pick that covered nature reserves and parks in the Nuneaton area.

11 people took part by using one of their two annual volunteer days that we provide to our colleagues for good causes of their choice.

Ben Hardcastle, Shift Manager, said: "In total we managed to fill over 20 bags of litter from various sites. The team were approached by several members of the public and when we mentioned RS offering volunteer days they were extremely impressed.

"Working together to achieve a common goal is something we do every day at RS, but to give something back to the local community was especially rewarding."

Well done everyone! We love seeing our people truly making amazing happen for a better world.

By 2026, Europe will have an EV charging station every 37 miles 🔌 🔋

The European Parliament and member states came to an agreement that will see European nations roll out electric and hydrogen charging points across the region over the next couple of years.

The end result will be an EV charging station every 37 miles (60 kilometers), according to a report by Bloomberg published on Tuesday.

🗣 [Concours d'éloquence Les Cicéronnades] 📢
« Ich bin ein Berliner » 🇩🇪 assénait John F. Kennedy, en juin 1963, sous les applaudissements 👏 des Berlinois de l’Ouest, en plein blocus de Berlin. C’est en se faisant le relais des mots de l’un des présidents les plus éloquents de l’histoire des États-Unis qu’ obtient une récompense 🏅 aux Cicéronnades. Le bureau du recteur de l’académie d’Orléans-Tours l’invite à la remise des prix 👩‍🎓 qui aura lieu le 31 mai, lors d’un cocktail 🍸 en grandes pompes au Château de Chambord 🏰 !
 
Estelle est étudiante en première année de  (Diplôme de Comptabilité et de Gestion) au lycée Louise Michel de Narbonne. Elle a participé au concours national d’éloquence en langue vivante étrangère, Les . Après une première étape cruciale du choix du texte à interpréter (sur le thème de la frontière cette année) les étudiants de DCG du Lycée Louise Michel volontaires ont bénéficié d’un cycle d’ateliers de prise de parole en public impulsé et mené par Marion Lopez-Burette. Travail sur le corps , sur la diction et sur la langue anglaise ainsi qu’entraînements aux techniques de prises de parole 🗣 en public ont clairement porté leurs fruits.
 
La prestation d’Estelle Camp témoigne à la fois de son travail et de l’intérêt qu’elle porte à la prise de parole. Le défi qu’elle a relevé prouve encore une fois l’importance pour l’ du futur de savoir communiquer et…pas qu’en français.
 
Décidément, la filière du DCG à Louise Michel est complète, enrichissante et épanouissante ! 😁

Looking to start your business in 2023? Check out these top 5 business cities that are booming with opportunities and potential for growth.

Remember, a strong business partner like Ampere can significantly help your journey. 🌟

Are you considering setting up a business in the UK?

The definition of an LLC in the UK is more diverse than in other countries. The most popular form here is the Private Limited Company (Ltd). As a Limited Company, shareholders' liability is limited to the face value of their shares, providing a safety net for your personal assets.

Another option is the Public Limited Company (PLC), which has a share capital of over £50,000 and shares traded on the stock market. A minimum of two directors and a company secretary are required.

Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) is yet another option. In this setup, partners are not liable for each other's actions, minimising shared liability.

Consult with professionals to make an informed decision and start your journey towards a thriving business. Remember, setting up the right business structure can significantly impact your success! 🤝

When setting up a business account in the UK, you might be asked to provide evidence of your establishment. Here's a rundown of the documents that will help ensure a smooth process:

1️⃣ Proof of Residence: Utility bills, tenancy agreements, or official letters with your UK address.

2️⃣ Certificate of Incorporation: A certificate of incorporation issued by Companies House is vital evidence for registered companies.

3️⃣ Business Activities Details: These could be specific addresses, locations, or even virtual offices, if applicable.

4️⃣ Staff and Work Details: Provide details of where your staff members are employed and the nature of their work within the business.

5️⃣ Physical Premises: If you own or lease any physical premises related to your business operations, include these details too.

6️⃣ Contracts, Orders, and Invoices: Providing details of contracts, orders, or invoices held or issued by your business will strengthen your case.

7️⃣ Business Accounts Proof: This could be in the form of official financial statements.

Important Note: You need more than a UK VAT or UK Economic Operator Registration and Identification (EORI) number to prove your establishment in the UK.

Gather at least one of these documents, and the Ampere team will drive the process seamlessly. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out!
